title: Virtual Book Fair 2025
description: Join authors, publishers, and book lovers worldwide in a 3-day virtual fair featuring new book releases, author interviews, live readings, and exclusive discounts on bestsellers. A perfect chance to discover your next favorite book from the comfort of home!

title: Live Talk with J.K. Rowling
description: Get exclusive insights into the magical world of Harry Potter directly from the creator herself! Participate in a live Q&A session, hear behind-the-scenes stories, and explore her journey as one of the most influential authors of our time.

title: Manga Mania Meetup
description: Celebrate your love for manga and anime with fellow fans. This event features panel discussions with manga artists, cosplay contests, drawing workshops, and early access to upcoming manga volumes. A must-attend for every otaku!
